text:
Nalini Sriharan, one of the life convicts in the Rajiv Gandhi assassination case, underwent medical check-up at the Government Vellore Medical College Hospital, Adukkamparai on Thursday.

IT Dept forms poll surveillance teams

Stepping up its vigil to check the influence of money power in the election process, the Income Tax (IT) Department has constituted surveillance teams in each of the 32 districts across the State.
title: Nalini undergoes check-up at GVMCH
